articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Japanese Yen rallies to just shy of 157.00 versus the USD - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) languishes near a multi-decade low against its American counterpart during the Asian session on Friday as traders keenly await the outcome of the highly-anticipated Bank of Japan (BoJ) policy meeting.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen weakens across the board after BoJ announced its policy decision.

articles.author: Samantha Mathewson
articles.title: Satellite images overlay 2024 and 2017 total solar eclipses sweeping across US - Space.com
articles.description: North America has experienced two transcontinental total solar eclipses within the last seven years, and these satellite images compare the crisscrossing paths of totality.
